H0.text: In which building is Napoleon Bonaparte buried. Arc de Triomphe

H1.text: In which building is Napoleon Bonaparte buried. Notre-Dame Cathedral

H2.text: In which building is Napoleon Bonaparte buried. Palace of Versailles

H3.text: In which building is Napoleon Bonaparte buried. Invalides

A4.text: Napoleon Bonaparte is buried under the Dome of the Invalides, as stated in the text: 'Napoleon was entombed under the Dome of the Invalides with a grand ceremony in 1840.'

A5.text: The Arc de Triomphe is not mentioned as Napoleon's burial site in the text. The text refers to the tomb being at Les Invalides, not the Arc de Triomphe.

A6.text: Notre-Dame Cathedral is not referenced as the location of Napoleon's tomb. The text explicitly states that the tomb is at Les Invalides, not Notre-Dame.

A7.text: The Palace of Versailles is not identified as the burial site of Napoleon in the text. The tomb is located at Les Invalides, not Versailles.
